reviews.comment: The enchiladas were amazing! Authentic flavors and generous portions. The service was friendly and quick. Will definitely be back!
Good food but the place was a bit crowded. Had to wait 20 minutes for a table. The tortilla soup was worth the wait though.
Best Mexican food in Ames! Their guacamole is made fresh at your table and the margaritas are excellent. Great atmosphere too.
Love the build-your-own concept! So many toppings to choose from and the crust is perfectly crispy. Fast service too.
Great value for the price. I can get a custom pizza with all my favorite toppings for under $10. The staff is always friendly.
Pizza is good but sometimes it's undercooked in the middle. Love their seasonal ingredients though.
Best burgers in town! The Wild Bacon Burger is incredible - perfectly cooked and the bacon is always crispy. Great fries too!
Really good burgers but a bit pricey. The quality is worth it though. Their homemade sauces are amazing.
Decent burgers but the service was slow. Waited almost 30 minutes for our food on a Tuesday night.
Standard Panda Express fare. The orange chicken is always reliable and the Beijing beef is pretty good too. Fast service.
Great for a quick lunch. The portions are generous and the staff is efficient. Love their chow mein!
It's fast food Chinese, so set your expectations accordingly. The food is consistent but nothing special. Convenient location though.
